meanings.definition: The quality or state of being discrete.
meanings.sent1: The discretenesses of the different colors made the painting stand out.
meanings.sent2: The discretenesses of the ingredients in the recipe are crucial for its success.
meanings.sent3: The discretenesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: The discretenesses of the stars in the night sky create a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The discretenesses of the musical notes blended harmoniously in the composition.

meanings.definition: The condition of being separate or distinct.
meanings.sent1: The discretenesses of the islands in the archipelago make each one unique.
meanings.sent2: The discretenesses of the flavors in the dish complemented each other perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The discretenesses of the characters in the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent4: The discretenesses of the fingerprints on the glass revealed the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The discretenesses of the snowflakes sparkled in the winter sunlight.
